alert.note: Alert for Albany; Converse (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 2:31PM MDT until April 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... Southwestern Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 230 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glenrock to 8 miles west of Boxelder, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Douglas, Glenrock, Rolling Hills, Rolling Hills Estates, Laprele Reservoir, Deer Creek, Boxelder, Curtis Gulch Campground and Campbell Creek Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 135 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
